title: Drawing, "Design for a Chest of Drawers", ca. 1805
medium: Pen and black ink, brush and watercolor on paper
creditline: Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council
description: Chest with six drawers decorated in marquetry inlay of arabesques. Piers and cornice in stylized plant forms. A metal gallery with finials at the corners above. Piece shown in isometric projection. Scale below.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Design for a Chest of Drawers", ca. 1805.
ca. 1805. Pen and black ink, brush and watercolor on paper. Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council. 1911-28-492.
